"Stormy+ is a student-made improvement over Ben Jakuben's weather app, Stormy. 
" "This app provides basic weather data to the user, provided by forecast.io's weather API. 
" "New features have been added, including a nicer UI, current location feature, and wind speed. 
" "
" "Things of note:
" "Wind speed is measured by meters per second. 
" "All data is pulled from forecast.io, via the website's developer API.
" "
" "Credits: Ben Jakuben (original code and tutorial), Treehouse, Daniel Kim 
"
